import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Badge, Spinner, Alert } from 'reactstrap'; import { Cloud, Thermometer, Calendar } from 'react-feather'; import useApi from '../hooks/useApi'; // Ajusta la ruta si está en otra carpeta const WeatherForecastPage = () => { const { data, loading, error } = useApi('http://localhost:5199/WeatherForecast'); return ( Pronóstico del Clima

Consulta el pronóstico del clima para los próximos días.

{loading && (
)} {error && ( Hubo un error al cargar el pronóstico. )} {data && data.map((forecast, index) => ( {new Date(forecast.date).toLocaleDateString()}
{forecast.temperatureC}°C {forecast.temperatureF}°F

{forecast.summary}

))} ); }; export default WeatherForecastPage;
